heading.name: Coronary Artery Disease
heading.definition: % of patients age 18 and older, with coronary artery disease (CAD) who received testing for any of the following: -Lipid profile screening (ever received a test) -Blood pressure measurement (in last 12 months) -Obesity/overweight screening (in last 12 months)
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from CIHIâ€™s 2012 Indicator Technical Specifications (Nov 2012)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.lipid > 0 OR fin.bp > 0 OR fin.bmi > 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% CAD Patients with LIPID, BP or BMI',
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, COUNT(fin.patient) - SUM( IF( fin.lipid > 0 OR fin.bp > 0 OR fin.bmi > 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% CAD Patients no measurement'
FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, BP.dataField AS bp, LIPID.dataField AS lipid, BMI.dataField AS bmi FROM demographic d INNER JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
-- Lipid Screening LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dataField, demographicNo FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code IN ${lipidLoinc} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) LIPID ON (d.demographic_no = LIPID.demographicNo)
-- Blood Pressure LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dataField, demographicNo FROM measurements WHERE type = ${bloodPressure} AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo HAVING COUNT(demographicNo) > -1 ) BP ON (d.demographic_no = BP.demographicNo)
-- BMI Screening -- Look for BMI index or if the height and weight was measured. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dataField, demographicNo FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bmi} AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo HAVING COUNT(demographicNo) > -1 ) BMI ON (d.demographic_no = BMI.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND ( dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodes} OR dxr.dxresearch_code LIKE ${dxcode} ) AND dxr.`status` NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(d.demographic_no) > -1 ) fin

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
-- Lipid Screening LEFT JOIN (
SELECT m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code IN ${lipidLoinc} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id)
) LIPID ON (d.demographic_no = LIPID.demographicNo)
-- Blood Pressure LEFT JOIN (
SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bloodPressure} AND demographicNo > 0 AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id)
) BP ON (d.demographic_no = BP.demographicNo)
-- BMI Screening -- Look for BMI index or if the height and weight was measured. LEFT JOIN (
SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bmi} AND demographicNo > 0 AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id)
) BMI ON (d.demographic_no = BMI.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND ( dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodes} OR dxr.dxresearch_code LIKE ${dxcode} ) AND dxr.`status` NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(d.demographic_no) > -1
